name: Jorge M. NELSON, Petitioner, v. In the COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Nelson v. Court of Common Pleas

parties: Jorge M. NELSON, Petitioner, v. In the COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 7th day of February, 2008, the Application Seeking Leave to File Original Process is granted. The Petition for Writ of Mandamus and/or Extraordinary Relief and/or Kings Bench Relief is denied.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
941 A.2d 1262
Jorge M. NELSON, Petitioner, v. In the COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Respondent.
No. 178 EM 2007.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Feb. 7, 2008.
